private_information: I arrive at The Castro at 09:00
I can travel from The Castro to Sunset District in 17 minutes
I can travel from Sunset District to The Castro in 17 minutes
My objective is to meet as many friends as possible today
you.goal: Maximize meetings with friends while ensuring a meeting with Deborah of at least 75 minutes at Sunset District within her availability window

private_information: I will be at Sunset District from 14:15 to 20:00
I am available to meet only during that interval
deborah.goal: Meet you at Sunset District for at least 75 minutes during my availability window

orchestrator.goal: Integrate agent availabilities and travel constraints and produce a PDDL domain and problem for the FastDownwards solver that finds an optimal meeting schedule satisfying the constraints

public_information: You arrive at The Castro at 09:00
Travel time between The Castro and Sunset District is 17 minutes each way
Deborah will be at Sunset District from 14:15 to 20:00
You want to meet Deborah for a minimum of 75 minutes

profile.system_prompt: You are the traveler providing structured scheduling information. Do not produce PDDL. Provide concise availability windows, travel capabilities, and any scheduling preferences in a clear structured form.
profile.prompt: Your name is you. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->you->private_information}. Your goal: {agents->you->goal}. Provide your current available time intervals for meetings today, any hard constraints, and reiterate travel times you will use. Return a concise structured summary labeled as your profile.

profile.system_prompt: You are a friend providing availability information. Do not produce PDDL. Provide concise availability windows and meeting constraints.
profile.prompt: Your name is deborah. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->deborah->private_information}. Your goal: {agents->deborah->goal}. Provide your precise availability windows and any meeting length constraints. Return a concise structured summary labeled as your profile.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent planning and PDDL. Your role is to integrate provided profiles and public constraints and produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem tailored for the FastDownwards planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep actions for different agents distinct. Optimize for meeting as many friends as possible while satisfying hard constraints such as arrival time and minimum meeting duration.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Received the traveler's profile: {you_profile}. Received Deborah's profile: {deborah_profile}. Produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem that represent locations, travel durations, time windows, meeting actions for each agent, and an objective that maximizes the number of friends met subject to constraints. Ensure the problem encodes arrival at The Castro at 09:00 and a meeting with Deborah at Sunset District of at least 75 minutes within her 14:15-20:00 window. Target the FastDownwards solver. Enclose the domain between <domain></domain> and the problem between <problem></problem>.
